title: Random lockups at specific occurances
body:
This has been an ongoing issue for years, and I've finally gotten bored enough to actually report it (as it doesn't actually affect gameplay in any way). Basically, when certain things happen, the game client will momentarily lockup, and then go back to business as usual. Never lasts more than one second, usually lasting only a fraction of a second. It's always highly noticeable though.

The overwhelmingly most common situation where it happens is the first death in a given match. It will, on extremely rare occasion, happen during other deaths as well. In every case (no exceptions), the lockup doesn't change a thing as it happens simultaneously with the death, as if the client failed to load something related to the death (character death animation, sound effect, recap screen, etc).

Very rarely the lockup can happen for other things. Someone spawning into the fountain after me during the initial spawn at match beginning (might be unrelated to this particular issue, though). Final hit kills a nexus. Probably a couple other cases I'm forgetting due to being so trivial.

Again, none of this affects gameplay in any way. It would just be one of those things that would be appreciated if fixed, somehow.

replies.body: Y'know, it does kinda sound like some kind of missing or damaged game file causing those weird lockups. Run the repair through the client options if you haven't yet as a quick first step, but if that doesn't seem to help sure to send over some game logs to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool).

Definitely not the client having damaged files, as this has been a continual issue through several completely fresh installs. I'll see about collecting some logs with that tool and getting them submitted, though.
